title: ‘Back to the Future II’ Correctly Predicted Cubs World Series Win in 2015?
subtitle: The 1989 film 'Back to the Future II' did not correctly predict Chicago would be the winner of a 2015 Cubs-Marlins World Series match-up.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The 1987 film Back to the Future II correctly predicted that the Florida Marlins would win the 1997 World Series and that the Cubs would play Florida in the 2015 World Series.
